channel.title: randomness on gzt does statistics
channel.description: Recent content in randomness on gzt does statistics

item.title: Why don't my results agree with some other function?
item.description: Or even with other functions in the same package? With a set seed, one would expect the random draws from two equivalent distributions to be the same. library('MixMatrix') set.seed(20180223) rmatrixnorm(n = 1, mean = matrix(0, nrow = 1, ncol = 5), array = T) ## , , 1 ## ## [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4] [,5] ## [1,] 1.153053 -0.08006347 1.040504 0.9671611 -0.002402098 set.seed(20180223) rmatrixnorm(n = 1, mean = matrix(0, nrow = 5, ncol = 1), array = T) ## , , 1 ## ## [,1] ## [1,] 1.
